column4: Hey, I just ndiswrapper'd my wifi card and it seemed to be working, but I can't seem to configure it to connect to my windows network? Can someone tell me what to do?
try using an application like wlassistant
I will try it, I downloaded wifi radar and it says I am connected, but when I unplug my ethernet cable I can't connect to any websites
does iwconfig show an ip next to the interfact, or ifconfig
Sorry, I am unfamiliar with those terms
do   sudo ifconfig   from a terminal and paste it on pastebin.ca
it is.. but I think it is possibly the best even when working on gnome.
try unplugging cable then  sudo ifconfig eth1 down
Could not connect to xchat or any websites
when it is down try running   sudo dhclient
The wlanassistant says I am connected
Any suggestions, because I would quite like to have internet without a cable agai
I have already said I dunno.  try running dhclient after you take out tha cable..
